verses.verse: וְ֠נַעֲמָן <WH5283> Now Naaman שַׂר־ <WH8269> captain צְבָ֨א <WH6635> of the host מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king אֲרָ֜ם <WH758> of Syria הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become אִישׁ֩ <WH376> man גָּד֨וֹל <WH1419> was a great לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> with אֲדֹנָיו֙ <WH113> his master וּנְשֻׂ֣א <WH5375> and honourable פָנִ֔ים <WH6440> accept כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because ב֛וֹ נָֽתַן־ <WH5414> had given יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> because by him the LORD תְּשׁוּעָ֖ה <WH8668> deliverance לַאֲרָ֑ם <WH758> unto Syria וְהָאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> man הָיָ֛ה <WH1961> become גִּבּ֥וֹר <WH1368> he was also a mighty חַ֖יִל <WH2428> in valour מְצֹרָֽע׃ <WH6879> [but he was] a leper

וַאֲרָם֙ <WH758> And the Syrians יָצְא֣וּ <WH3318> had gone out גְדוּדִ֔ים <WH1416> by companies וַיִּשְׁבּ֛וּ <WH7617> and had brought away captive מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel נַעֲרָ֣ה <WH5291> maid קְטַנָּ֑ה <WH6996> a little וַתְּהִ֕י <WH1961> waited לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> and she waited on אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> wife נַעֲמָֽן׃ <WH5283> Naaman's

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And she said אֶל־ <WH413> to her גְּבִרְתָּ֔הּ <WH1404> unto her mistress אַחֲלֵ֣י <WH305> Would אֲדֹנִ֔י <WH113> God my lord לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> [were] with הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> the prophet אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בְּשֹׁמְר֑וֹן <WH8111> that [is] in Samaria אָ֛ז <WH227> for יֶאֱסֹ֥ף <WH622> he would recover אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> מִצָּרַעְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH6883> him of his leprosy

וַיָּבֹ֕א <WH935> And [one] went in וַיַּגֵּ֥ד <WH5046> and told לַאדֹנָ֖יו <WH113> his lord לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כָּזֹ֤את <WH2063> likewise וְכָזֹאת֙ <WH2063> likewise דִּבְּרָ֣ה <WH1696> Thus and thus said הַֽנַּעֲרָ֔ה <WH5291> the maid אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> that [is] of the land יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king אֲרָם֙ <WH758> of Syria לֶךְ־ <WH1980> Go בֹּ֔א <WH935> go וְאֶשְׁלְחָ֥ה <WH7971> and I will send סֵ֖פֶר <WH5612> a letter אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיֵּלֶךְ֩ <WH1980> departed וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> and took בְּיָד֜וֹ <WH3027> with him עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> ten כִּכְּרֵי־ <WH3603> talents כֶ֗סֶף <WH3701> of silver וְשֵׁ֤שֶׁת <WH8337> and six אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> thousand זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> [pieces] of gold וְעֶ֖שֶׂר <WH6235> and ten חֲלִיפ֥וֹת <WH2487> changes בְּגָדִֽים׃ <WH899> of raiment

וַיָּבֵ֣א <WH935> And he brought הַסֵּ֔פֶר <WH5612> the letter אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> and now כְּב֨וֹא <WH935> is come הַסֵּ֤פֶר <WH5612> Now when this letter הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> to you הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold שָׁלַ֤חְתִּי <WH7971> unto thee behold I have [therewith] sent אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> נַעֲמָ֣ן <WH5283> Naaman עַבְדִּ֔י <WH5650> my servant וַאֲסַפְתּ֖וֹ <WH622> to thee that thou mayest recover מִצָּרַעְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH6883> him of his leprosy

וַיְהִ֡י <WH1961> become כִּקְרֹא֩ <WH7121> had read מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And it came to pass when the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> הַסֵּ֜פֶר <WH5612> the letter וַיִּקְרַ֣ע <WH7167> that he rent בְּגָדָ֗יו <WH899> his clothes וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said הַאֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> [Am] I God אָ֙נִי֙ <WH589> I לְהָמִ֣ית <WH4191> to kill וּֽלְהַחֲי֔וֹת <WH2421> and to make alive כִּֽי־ <WH3588> how זֶה֙ <WH2088> that this man שֹׁלֵ֣חַ <WH7971> doth send אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to לֶאֱסֹ֥ף <WH622> unto me to recover אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> a man מִצָּֽרַעְתּ֑וֹ <WH6883> leprosy כִּ֤י <WH3588> how אַךְ־ <WH389> also דְּעֽוּ־ <WH3045> consider נָא֙ <WH4994> now וּרְא֔וּ <WH7200> I pray you and see כִּֽי־ <WH3588> how מִתְאַנֶּ֥ה <WH579> how he seeketh a quarrel ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לִֽי׃

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> happened כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ ׀ <WH8085> had heard אֱלִישָׁ֣ע <WH477> And it was [so] when Elisha אִישׁ־ <WH376> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for קָרַ֤ע <WH7167> had rent מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> that the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> בְּגָדָ֔יו <WH899> his clothes וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <WH7971> that he sent אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> Why קָרַ֖עְתָּ <WH7167> Wherefore hast thou rent בְּגָדֶ֑יךָ <WH899> his clothes יָבֹֽא־ <WH935> come נָ֣א <WH4994> I beseech thee אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me וְיֵדַ֕ע <WH3045> now to me and he shall know כִּ֛י <WH3588> that יֵ֥שׁ <WH3426> that there is נָבִ֖יא <WH5030> a prophet בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> in Israel

וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> came נַעֲמָ֖ן <WH5283> So Naaman [בְּסוּסֹו כ] (בְּסוּסָ֣יו <WH5483> crane ק) וּבְרִכְבּ֑וֹ <WH7393> and with his chariot וַיַּעֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> and stood פֶּֽתַח־ <WH6607> at the door הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the house לֶאֱלִישָֽׁע׃ <WH477> of Elisha

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> sent אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> about אֱלִישָׁ֖ע <WH477> And Elisha מַלְאָ֣ךְ <WH4397> a messenger לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> unto him saying הָל֗וֹךְ <WH1980> Go וְרָחַצְתָּ֤ <WH7364> and wash שֶֽׁבַע־ <WH7651> seven פְּעָמִים֙ <WH6471> times בַּיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> in Jordan וְיָשֹׁ֧ב <WH7725> shall come again בְּשָׂרְךָ֛ <WH1320> and thy flesh לְךָ֖ וּטְהָֽר׃ <WH2891> to thee and thou shalt be clean

וַיִּקְצֹ֥ף <WH7107> was wroth נַעֲמָ֖ן <WH5283> But Naaman וַיֵּלַ֑ךְ <WH1980> and went וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> and said הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אָמַ֜רְתִּי <WH559> Behold I thought אֵלַ֣י ׀ <WH413> over יֵצֵ֣א <WH3318> He will surely יָצ֗וֹא <WH3318> come out וְעָמַד֙ <WH5975> to me and stand וְקָרָא֙ <WH7121> and call בְּשֵׁם־ <WH8034> on the name יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֔יו <WH430> his God וְהֵנִ֥יף <WH5130> and strike יָד֛וֹ <WH3027> his hand אֶל־ <WH413> over הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> over the place וְאָסַ֥ף <WH622> and recover הַמְּצֹרָֽע׃ <WH6879> the leper

הֲלֹ֡א <WH3808> not טוֹב֩ <WH2896> better [אֲבָנָה כ] (אֲמָנָ֨ה <WH71> Abana ק) וּפַרְפַּ֜ר <WH6554> and Pharpar נַהֲר֣וֹת <WH5104> rivers דַּמֶּ֗שֶׂק <WH1834> of Damascus מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> all מֵימֵ֣י <WH4325> than all the waters יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel הֲלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אֶרְחַ֥ץ <WH7364> bathe בָּהֶ֖ם וְטָהָ֑רְתִּי <WH2891> in them and be clean וַיִּ֖פֶן <WH6437> ? So he turned וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> and went בְּחֵמָֽה׃ <WH2534> in a rage

וַיִּגְּשׁ֣וּ <WH5066> came near עֲבָדָיו֮ <WH5650> And his servants וַיְדַבְּר֣וּ <WH1696> and spake אֵלָיו֒ <WH413> to him וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> unto him and said אָבִי֙ <WH1> My father דָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> thing גָּד֗וֹל <WH1419> thee [do some] great הַנָּבִ֛יא <WH5030> [if] the prophet דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> had bid אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> about הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not תַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <WH6213> wouldest thou not have done וְאַ֛ף <WH637> [it]? how much rather then כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when אָמַ֥ר <WH559> when he saith אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> to you רְחַ֥ץ <WH7364> to thee Wash וּטְהָֽר׃ <WH2891> and be clean

וַיֵּ֗רֶד <WH3381> Then went he down וַיִּטְבֹּ֤ל <WH2881> and dipped בַּיַּרְדֵּן֙ <WH3383> in Jordan שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> himself seven פְּעָמִ֔ים <WH6471> times כִּדְבַ֖ר <WH1697> according to the saying אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> of the man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וַיָּ֣שָׁב <WH7725> came again בְּשָׂר֗וֹ <WH1320> and his flesh כִּבְשַׂ֛ר <WH1320> like unto the flesh נַ֥עַר <WH5288> child קָטֹ֖ן <WH6996> of a little וַיִּטְהָֽר׃ <WH2891> and he was clean

וַיָּשָׁב֩ <WH7725> And he returned אֶל־ <WH413> to אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> to the man הָאֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> of God ה֣וּא <WH1931> he וְכָֽל־ <WH3605> all מַחֲנֵ֗הוּ <WH4264> he and all his company וַיָּבֹא֮ <WH935> and came וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> and stood לְפָנָיו֒ <WH6440> before וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> him and he said הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold נָ֤א <WH4994> now יָדַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH3045> Behold now I know כִּ֣י <WH3588> that אֵ֤ין <WH369> there אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> that [there is] no God בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in all the earth כִּ֖י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> but in Israel וְעַתָּ֛ה <WH6258> now קַח־ <WH3947> now therefore I pray thee take נָ֥א <WH4994> please בְרָכָ֖ה <WH1293> a blessing מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5650> of thy servant

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> But he said חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> [As] the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom עָמַ֥דְתִּי <WH5975> whom I stand לְפָנָ֖יו <WH6440> before אִם־ <WH518> nothing אֶקָּ֑ח <WH3947> I will receive וַיִּפְצַר־ <WH6484> none And he urged בּ֥וֹ לָקַ֖חַת <WH3947> him to take וַיְמָאֵֽן׃ <WH3985> [it] but he refused

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <WH559> said נַעֲמָן֒ <WH5283> And Naaman וָלֹ֕א <WH3808> will no יֻתַּן־ <WH5414> Shall there not then I pray thee be given נָ֣א <WH4994> please לְעַבְדְּךָ֔ <WH5650> to thy servant מַשָּׂ֥א <WH4853> burden צֶֽמֶד־ <WH6776> two פְּרָדִ֖ים <WH6505> mules' אֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> of earth כִּ֡י <WH3588> for לֽוֹא־ <WH3808> nor יַעֲשֶׂה֩ <WH6213> will henceforth offer ע֨וֹד <WH5750> longer עַבְדְּךָ֜ <WH5650> your servant עֹלָ֤ה <WH5930> neither burnt offering וָזֶ֙בַח֙ <WH2077> nor sacrifice לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> unto other כִּ֖י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> but unto the LORD

לַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> In this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this יִסְלַ֥ח <WH5545> pardon יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD לְעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> thy servant בְּב֣וֹא <WH935> goeth אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> [that] when my master בֵית־ <WH1004> into the house רִמּוֹן֩ <WH7417> of Rimmon לְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֨ת <WH7812> to worship שָׁ֜מָּה <WH8033> there וְה֣וּא ׀ <WH1931> and he נִשְׁעָ֣ן <WH8172> there and he leaneth עַל־ <WH5921> on יָדִ֗י <WH3027> on my hand וְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֵ֙יתִי֙ <WH7812> and I bow בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> myself in the house רִמֹּ֔ן <WH7417> of Rimmon בְּהִשְׁתַּחֲוָיָ֙תִי֙ <WH7812> when I bow down בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> myself in the house רִמֹּ֔ן <WH7417> of Rimmon יִסְלַח־ <WH5545> pardon [נָא <WH4994> I beseech thee כ] יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD לְעַבְדְּךָ֖ <WH5650> thy servant בַּדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> in this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> And he said ל֖וֹ לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Go לְשָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> in peace וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> departed מֵאִתּ֖וֹ <WH853> כִּבְרַת־ <WH3530> from him a little אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> way ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said גֵּיחֲזִ֗י <WH1522> But Gehazi נַעַר֮ <WH5288> the servant אֱלִישָׁ֣ע <WH477> of Elisha אִישׁ־ <WH376> the man הָאֱלֹהִים֒ <WH430> of God הִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <WH2009> Behold חָשַׂ֣ךְ <WH2820> hath spared אֲדֹנִ֗י <WH113> Behold my master אֶֽת־ <WH853> נַעֲמָ֤ן <WH5283> Naaman הָֽאֲרַמִּי֙ <WH761> this Syrian הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this מִקַּ֥חַת <WH3947> in not receiving מִיָּד֖וֹ <WH3027> at his hands אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what הֵבִ֑יא <WH935> that which he brought חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> but [as] the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo רַ֣צְתִּי <WH7323> I will run אַחֲרָ֔יו <WH310> after וְלָקַחְתִּ֥י <WH3947> him and take מֵאִתּ֖וֹ <WH853> מְאֽוּמָה׃ <WH3972> somewhat
